aspects.name: Aspect of Zagreus
aspects.description:
The form in which the heart-seeking bow first revealed itself.

It senses stalwart hearts, mostly to stop them but occasionally to be used.
aspects.cost:
1 / 1 / 1 / 1 / 1

(Total: 5 )

aspects.name: Aspect of Chiron
aspects.description:
Your Special automatically seeks the foe last struck by your Attack.

When first it was fashioned, the centaur lord himself affirmed its might.
aspects.cost:
1 / 2 / 3 / 4 / 5

(Total: 15 )

aspects.name: Aspect of Hera
aspects.description:
Your Cast loads into your next Attack, firing on impact.

None dared approach the queen of the gods, a reputation she cultivated.
aspects.cost:
2 / 2 / 3 / 4 / 5

(Total: 16 )

aspects.name: Aspect of Rama
aspects.description:
You have Celestial Sharanga*, which can cause Shared Suffering.

The preserver's marksmanship is one of his many unequaled qualities
aspects.cost:
3 / 3 / 3 / 3 / 3

(Total: 15 )

upgrades.name: Twin Shot
upgrades.description: Your Attack fires 2 shots side-by-side, but has reduced range.
upgrades.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Triple Shot or Sniper Shot.
  • Decreases attack range to 65%

upgrades.name: Sniper Shot
upgrades.description: Your Attack deals +200% damage to distant foes.
upgrades.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Point-Blank Shot or Twin Shot
  • Increases damage to foes farther than 675 away
  • Attack line gains marker for minimum range of "distant foes".

upgrades.name: Explosive Shot
upgrades.description: Your Attack deals +300% base damage in an area, but charges slower.
upgrades.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Flurry Shot or Chain Shot
  • Damage Radius: 350
  • Increase charge time by 100%

upgrades.name: Flurry Shot
upgrades.description: Hold Attack to shoot rapidly, but you cannot Power Shot.
upgrades.notes:
• Attack damage: 60 (40 for dash attack)
  • Cannot be combined with Perfect Shot or Explosive Shot
  • Incompatible with Aspect of Rama.

upgrades.name: Piercing Volley
upgrades.description: Your Special pierces foes and deals +400% damage to Armor.

upgrades.name: Perfect Shot
upgrades.description: Your Power Shot is easier to execute and deals +150% damage.

upgrades.name: Triple Shot
upgrades.description: Your Attack fires 3 shots in a spread pattern.

upgrades.name: Charged Volley
upgrades.description: Hold Special for up to 350% base damage; minimum range is reduced.
upgrades.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Relentless Volley
  • Incompatible with Aspect of Chiron or Aspect of Rama

upgrades.name: Chain Shot
upgrades.description: Your Attack bounces to up to 3 foes, dealing +15% damage for each.

upgrades.name: Point-Blank Shot
upgrades.description: Your Attack deals +150% damage to nearby foes.
upgrades.notes:
• Incompatible with Sniper Shot
  • Increases damage to foes closer than 330 away
  • Attack line gains marker for maximum range of "nearby foes".

upgrades.name: Concentrated Volley
upgrades.description: Your Special deals +3 base damage for each consecutive hit to a foe.

upgrades.name: Repulse Shot
upgrades.description: Your Celestial Sharanga Attack creates a Blast Wave around you.
upgrades.notes:
• Aspect of Rama Exclusive
  • Blast Wave deals no damage, instead does Knockback
